title: 27 Purrfectly Simple Memes Showing the Secret to Meowternal Happiness is Through Adopting an Awwdorable Cat Child
description: Meoowwwwwwww! For those of you who aren't fluent in cat, that roughly translates to "Happy Monday, feline fam!" Speaking cat isn't an exact science, after all. Anyway, we have a very exciting piece of news to share with you - we have found the secret to meowternal happiness. The answer is actually much simpler than you might imagine. No, it's not money. No, it's not cars, or a house with a white picket fence, or having the purrfect job. The answer is right in front of you - it's cats!Specifically, the answer is adopting another cat. If you keep adopting cats, you will always be surrounded by love, fuzzy cuddles, and cute creatures that want to spend every waking (and sleeping) meowment with you. That sounds like meowternal happiness to us! If you don't believe us, we've compiled a catnip collection of purrfectly simple memes that support our case for adopting an awwdorable cat child. But shhhhh, don't tell everyone you know - then it won't be an example anymore!
author: Blakeseidel
excerpt: 27 Purrfectly Simple Memes Showing the Secret to Meowternal Happiness is Through Adopting an Awwdorable Cat Child - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Meoowwwwwwww! For those of you who aren't fluent in cat, that roughly translates to "Happy Monday, feline fam!" Speaking cat isn't an exact science, after all. Anyway, we have a very exciting piece of news to share with you - we have found the secret to meowternal happiness. The answer is actually much simpler than you might imagine. No, it's not money. No, it's not cars, or a house with a white picket fence, or having the purrfect job. The answer is right in front of you - it's cats!

Specifically, the answer is adopting another cat. If you keep adopting cats, you will always be surrounded by love, fuzzy cuddles, and cute creatures that want to spend every waking (and sleeping) meowment with you. That sounds like meowternal happiness to us! If you don't believe us, we've compiled a catnip collection of purrfectly simple memes that support our case for adopting an awwdorable cat child. But shhhhh, don't tell everyone you know - then it won't be an example anymore!
